  • Method Details

    • getObjectiveResource

      public abstract Optional<ResourcePrimary> getObjectiveResource()
      This method provides the resource primary of the card for counting the points of the position objectives. Its implementation will return Null inside InitialCard.

    • playFront

      public abstract int playFront(Table table, Coordinate playCoordinate)
      this method play the card in the front verse
      Parameters:
      table - indicates the table in which the card is played
      playCoordinate - indicate the coordinates in which the card should be player

    • playBack

      public abstract void playBack(Table table, Coordinate playCoordinate)
      this method play the card in the back verse
      Parameters:
      table - indicates the table in which the card is played
      playCoordinate - indicate the coordinates in which the card should be played

    • getFrontCardResource
